text:
A bit about my day yesterday!
*I worked:* from 8AM to 5PM (with an hour or so for lunch) and then again from 8pm to 10pm. 
*I worked on:* a few calls with potential clients (pitching my business & talking about their problems)
*My colleague gave me feedback:* saying good job on one of the sales pitches as the result sounds promising!
*I learnt:* a bit about how to sell to big corporates and best approach them for a sale opportunity
*I'm felt:* slightly stressed yesterday! But in a good way, some stress/challenge helps motivate you :smiley:

Here's my day today:
*Today I worked:* from 9AM to 1PM and then from 4PM until probably 10PM tonight! :alarm_clock:
*Today tasks / activities I worked on:* I got a meeting with another network of colleges in the diary, chased a few sales leads and kept a few of my schools in the loop on our pilot study progress :ok_hand: 
*Today my colleague gave me feedback:* saying nice work getting another group of colleges interested! We also discussed my plan on next steps with an employer that may pay for our services - it's always good to get a 2nd opinion :bowtie:
*Today I'm learning / reading:* a back log of daily Venture Pulse emails (<http://www.venturepulse.org/>) - a great insight into large startups activity
*Today I'm feeling (stress levels):* Pretty chilled :facepunch::smirk: Feeling like getting good traction with the business and hard work is paying off (finally!)

attachments.title: Venture Pulse Daily - Curated Funding News & Data from VCs, Accelerators and Angel Investors
attachments.text: Venture Pulse Daily is the email newsletter that provides you curated Venture Deals. Get the latest Funding News & Data from the Venture Capital Firms, Accelerators and Angel Investors.
